Description: Bronze container for mummified eel; on top is figure of eel with fore-part in form of human-headed uraeus wearing double crown.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 153
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
